job_details.degree_required: B.S. degree or equivalent work experience

jd: From: Nitin Raj, Veridian Tech Solutions nitin@veridiants.com Reply to: nitin@veridiants.com Hi ,Greetings from Veridian Tech Solutions, Inc!!! This is Nitin from Veridian Tech Solutions, Inc. Veridian Tech Solutions, Inc is providing enhanced IT consulting to top Notch IT Clients. I would appreciate it if you could render the requirement details below and if interested, kindly share a copy of your resume, else please take a moment to forward these Job details to someone you think might be interested and good fit for the job. Find the JD for your reference. Title: SQL Server DBA in AWSLocation: RemoteDuration: Long-term Contract Ready to Work on 4 weekdays and 1 Saturday working every week Job Description:This position is primarily a SQL Server in AWS production support DBA role with responsibilities that include developing, implementing, and maintaining RDBMS structures to support business needs and application development. Will coordinate, review, analyze and approve the physical database requirements of databases and all associated objects, such as, but not limited to the applications that access the RDBMS structures.Primary Responsibilities:Extensive experience with SQL Server in AWSVery Large DB (VLDB) migration AWS/Azure experienceMust have OLTP, transaction processing, or healthcare experienceExperience with building/migrating databases to AWS/Azure and using Docker imagesDBA tools to do Performance Tuning and Capacity Planning PartitioningExperience running multiple database instancesResource Management within database (not people management)Ability to work 24 hour on-call support rotationYou’ll be rewarded and recognized for your performance in an environment that will challenge you and give you clear direction on what it takes to succeed in your role as well as provide development for other roles you may be interested in.Required Qualifications:B.S. degree or equivalent work experience with Relational Database Management Systems with SQL SERVER 2008/2012/2014/2016/2017 in AWS5+ years of experience with systems development methodologies5+ years of experience with the design, creation, and maintenance of database structures5+ years of experience with the development and revision of database standards, procedures, and strategies3+ years of experience with AWS/Azure VLDB environments3+ years of experience with a combination of Oracle and PostgreSQL (version 12 or higher)Preferred Qualification:Proven ability to work independently and take ownership of their responsibilities and effectively communicate and follow tasks through to completion Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/in/nitin-raj-83169b15a/Nitin RajTechnical Recruiter Veridian Tech Solutions, IncCertified by WOSB, WBENC, HUB nitin@veridiants.comwww.veridiants.com11931 Wick Chester Lane Suite 150 Houston, TX, 77043“Verdian is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.
